metadata.description:
so different - Cudos (feat. DEEGAN) 
Releasing on DSPs October 27th.

Cudos (Dan and Alex) hit me up earlier this summer to work on a song after hearing me on Daniel Allan's "Overstimulated". They sent me a beat titled "Whats The Point?" and I was instantly in love with not only the sound of the instrumental, but the idea the track. Even if "what's the point" was just a place holder name, it spoke volumes, and I was instantly inspired to create a world around that single phrase.

After being dumped, there are really only two options that a 'dumpee' can take... but they both unfortunately lead to the same place. 
Here are the two options:

1. Accept your fate and move on.
2. Change everything about yourself so the 'dumper' loves the "new version" of you! (pssst there is no new version, it's impossible.)

Outside of the song itself, personal growth and healthy change are always welcomed, and with the release of "so different" Cudos is making a healthy change in their independent music career by transferring over to Web3. 
I love full circle moments. Let's take a look shall we?

Daniel Allan and Cudos collaborate on a song Pre-Music NFTs. -> 

Daniel Allan onboards me to Web3 with "Overstimulated". -> 

Cudos hears "Really Cool" and wants to make a song with me. -> 

I onboard Cudos to Web3 with "so different" -> 

Cudos makes the official remix for "Cool Water" on Daniel Allan's second Web3 EP "Glass House".

Don't you just love that? 
Welcome to sound.xyz Cudos! So proud of you fellas :)


Written by Cudos, DEEGAN, Natiive
Produced by Cudos
Co-Production by DEEGAN & Natiive 
Lyrics by DEEGAN
Artwork by Bella Friedman
